name: EUROPEAN NURSERYSTOCK ASSOCIATION npo (ENA)
goal: ENA is a network of a number of associations from the nursery stock sector all over Europe.  ENA represents at an international level the common interests of growers and traders of hardy nursery stock products, including perennials. ENA also tries to be a platform for exchanging knowledge between members. This purpose is among other things, carried out by means of meetings, publications, contacts with national, EU and international organizations and authorities, the encouragement of professional training, scientific developments and research, promotional activities and international documentation, publicity and exhibitions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
- Plant Health EU Regulation
- Plant Protection Products
- Plant Reproductive Material EU Regulation
- Invasive Alien Species EU Regulation
- VAT (Value Added Tax)
- CAP (Common Agricultural Policy)
- TTIP (Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership)
- Promotion of Agricultural Products
